item.title: International Oscar Submissions: Japan, Taiwan, Tunisia Among Recent Additions
item.description: Oscar season is about to kick into high gear with fall festival season just around the corner. The deadline to submit international feature selections is Oct. 1, so look for a flurry of announcements

item.title: Oscars: Switzerland Picks Health-Care Drama ‘Late Shift’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: ‘September 5’ actress Leonie Benesch stars as an overworked nurse in Petra Volpe’s timely drama.
